long_description: With the refined, lightweight SL frame, the men's Cannondale Quick SL 3 bike features a speedy hybrid design for getting outside and putting in some miles in a comfortable, upright riding position. SL version features refined, lightweight frame tubing and an integrated seat binder to save weight over the standard Quick frame. 6061 aluminum frame features a carbon fork for a versatile, comfortable ride on everything from jaunts to the store to century-length charity rides. Frame also features exaggerated Synapse Active Vibration Elimination (S.A.V.E.) design in seatstays and chainstays to reduce road vibration. Flat handlebar design offers an upright riding position for improved comfort and visibility. Shimano components ensure accurate, dependable shifts throughout the 27 gear combinations. Mini-V linear-pull brakes make easy work of speed management. Fast-rolling 700c wheels are outfitted with Kenda Kwick Bitumen tires for all-around riding. Specs on the Cannondale Quick SL 3 bike are subject to change.
short_description: With the refined, lightweight SL frame, the men's Cannondale Quick SL 3 bike features a speedy hybrid design for getting outside and putting in some miles in a comfortable, upright riding position.
